MS MCQs

    Load test Azure web apps by using Azure DevOps

    »

    1. Which of the following is a key performance test feature in Azure DevOps?

      Azure DevOps performance tests can test policies for all your Azure services.

      Azure DevOps performance tests can be configured to simulate a specific mix of user browser types.

      Azure DevOps performance tests can be configured across multiple platforms.


    2. What metrics are captured after a performance test is successfully completed?

      Duration, success rate, and availability.

      Average response time, requests per second, and user load.

      Runtime, throughput, and number of requests.


    3. You’ve increased the number of users allowed to access your web app at the same time from 10 users to 20 users. How do you test if this change has affected performance?

      Run individual tests and manually compare the results.

      Export test results to Application Insights to compare the results.

      Compare two test runs by using Azure DevOps.
